HelpPage.description: Find answers to the most common questions here. Don't see your question? Feel free to reach out.

faq.question: How do I install Rolodink?
faq.answer: Rolodink is a Chrome Extension. You can add it with one click from the Chrome Web Store. After installation, it's immediately active on the LinkedIn website. Make sure to refresh the page if you don't see the sidebar right away.

faq.question: Is Rolodink really free?
faq.answer: Yes, the core functionality of Rolodink is completely free. We want everyone to have the opportunity to better manage their network. In the future, there may be premium features for power users, but the basics will remain free.

faq.question: Where are my notes stored?
faq.answer: Your notes are securely stored in the cloud, linked to your account. They are private and only visible to you. We take privacy very seriously and never sell your data. Read our Privacy Policy for more details.

faq.question: Does Rolodink also work on the mobile LinkedIn app?
faq.answer: Currently, Rolodink only works as a Chrome Extension on desktop computers. A mobile solution is on our roadmap for the future.

faq.question: I don't see the Rolodink sidebar on LinkedIn. What now?
faq.answer: Try refreshing the LinkedIn page. If that doesn't work, check if the extension is enabled via the puzzle piece icon in your Chrome toolbar. Contact us if the problem persists.

faq.question: Can I export my data?
faq.answer: This functionality is currently under development. We understand the importance of data ownership and are working on an option to export all your notes and contact information.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Rolodink

why.question: Why Rolodink? Aren't there enough CRM systems?
why.answer: Rolodink is specifically designed for LinkedIn and focuses on personal notes instead of complex CRM functions.

free.question: Is Rolodink really free?
free.answer: Yes, Rolodink is completely free to use as a Chrome extension. No credit card required, no limits.

security.question: How secure are my notes?
security.answer: Your notes are securely stored with encryption and are only visible to you. We use end-to-end encryption and comply with GDPR guidelines.

mobile.question: Does Rolodink work on mobile?
mobile.answer: Currently, Rolodink is available as a Chrome extension. A mobile version is in development.

export.question: Can I export my notes?
export.answer: Yes, you can export all your notes to various formats for backup and transfer.

visibility.question: Do others see my notes on LinkedIn?
visibility.answer: No, your notes are completely private and only visible to you.

legal.question: Does Rolodink comply with privacy laws?
legal.answer: Yes, Rolodink complies with GDPR and all relevant privacy legislation. Your data is never shared with third parties.

support.question: What about updates and support?
support.answer: Rolodink is regularly updated with new features and security patches. Support is available via our Help Center.
